title: New: Fickle Friends – For You
body:
Brighton’s **Fickle Friends** have just released a new track entitled _For You_ and it’s a jumping three and a half minutes of excitement.

The production is glistening and the melodies shoot a dose of nostalgia straight to the heart. This is great stuff from a band that is surely going places.

_For You_ is out 23rd September in North America via Crazy Heart Records and is available now in the U.K.
